relationships.description: Harry put on the Cloak to make himself, Ron and Hermione invisible.
Hermione told Harry to get the Cloak on.
Ron was wearing the Cloak along with Harry and Hermione.
Professor McGonagall was shepherding a herd of galloping desks.
